alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 6:57AM EST until January 09 at 8:30AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Western Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Western Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Western Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 730 AM CST. * At 556 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dozier to near Navarre, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Elba, Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Geneva, Enterprise, Fort Novosel, Samson, New Brockton, Eglin Air Force Base, Lee, Union, Liberty, Freeport, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Kinston, Caryville, Westville, Coffee Springs, and Oakwood Hills. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CST for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida.
